footnotes: Alif Lam Mim, ni harufi zilizo undiwa Qur'ani, kama yalivyo undiwa maneno yenu. Ikiwa mmeshindwa kuleta mfano wake hii, basi ni ushahidi kuwa hii inatokana na Mwenyezi Mungu, wala hakuisema mwanaadamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
